page.title: 05Church Affairs.
page.content: Kingsdown Church was finished in 1850. The present Rector is the Reverend John Silk who came in 1984.This year there have been 26 visitors,including visitors from oversea countries, such as Canada,Sweden,West Germany and New Zealand.There have been two baptisms, one marriage and six funerals.Also there have been two visiting priests: the Reverend Aust and the Reverend E. Smith. In 1974 Ringwould and Kingsdown churches were combined. Times of Services. 8.00 a.m,Holy Communion. 11.15 a.m,Mattins or Family Service. 6.30 p.m,Evensong and Youth Praise Service.
